page.title: 01Shropshire Farmland
page.content: Largely an agaricultural area of gently undulating form in the lee of a sandstone escarpement. Much of the land used for growing crops, cattle and other pasture. The most prominent residential area village within the block is that of Bobbington in the South west corner and towards the centre a large area is covered bbyy a private civil aerodrome at Halfpenny Green. Some quarying has taken place in the Eastern side of the block, this is now being filled, at present and used as a golf course. A popular commuting area for the West midlands.
